structure.unit: ARTICLE XL. KENDALL TAMIAMI EXECUTIVE AIRPORT ZONING

law.catch_line: Establishment of airport zoning area for Kendall Tamiami Executive Airport.

text.section:
Sec. 33-391. Establishment of airport zoning area for Kendall Tamiami Executive Airport.
For the purpose of this article there is hereby created and established the airport zoning area for Kendall Tamiami Executive Airport and it is hereby ordained that such area shall include, and the provisions of this article shall be applicable to and embrace all of the unincorporated and the incorporated land and water area lying, situate and being in those certain portions of Miami-Dade County, Florida, described as follows, to wit:
In Township 55 South, Range 37 East, all of Sections 1, 12, 13, 24, 25 and 36.
In Township 55 South, Range 38 East, all of Section 1 to 32 inclusive.
In Township 55 South, Range 39 East, all of Sections 1 to 30 inclusive.
In Township 55 South, Range 40 East, all of Sections 1 to 30 inclusive, and the north one-half (½) of Section 36.
In Township 55 South, Range 41 East, all of Sections 6, 7, 18, 19, 30, and the north one-half (½) of Section 31
In Township 54 South, Range 40 East, the south one-half (½) of Sections 35 and 36.
In Township 54 South, Range 41 East, the south one-half (½) of Section 31
All of Lot 1 as the same lies between Township 54 South, Range 37 East and Township 55 South, Range 37 East.
All of Lot 6 as the same lies between Township 54 South, Range 38 East and Township 55 South, Range 38 East.
